channel.title: ideas on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ideas on Barefoot Rob

item.title: bright ideas
item.description: 10:10 Thursday 12 January 2017 JST I found a website that allowed custom orders for their products. Like a shopping cart, but with several dropdowns to specify attributes of the product. Hmm I wonder if we could make a custom form builder for people who have customers with custom orders but no website skizzles. That’s been done, but I wonder if there’s a market for it in Japan(ese). Oooh oooh what about custom greetings cards?
